name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: Recovers 30% of HP
name: Heal

description: Spews magic fire from one's mouth at all enemies
name: Dragon Fire

description:
'O' Great Voltaic Roar' - Unleashes a bolt of lightning
that hits everywhere
name: Lightning Burst

description:
'As fast as crimson lightning' - It makes the user
faster and stronger!
name: Haste

description:
'From sea to sky' a magic spell that creates water to
clense the body of all debuffs (not ailments)
name: Disperse Water

description:
A multi-hitting physical attack that utilizes Gale's
claws.
name: Claw Assault

description: A physical tail swipe that weakens defenses
name: Tail Slam

description:
A magic sword strike that also does lightning damage.
The lightning is the second strike.
name: Thunder Blade

description:
Gale goes all out and follows her instincts to attack
a single enemy.
name: Draconic Rampage

description:
Alain uses his sword skills to perform multiple
physical blows on the enemy.
name: Sword Mastery - Wyvern Form

description: Recovers 60% of HP
name: Accelerated Heal

description: A weak physical attack that may blind two enemies.
name: Blinding Strike

description: A smokescreen that may cause sleep to all enemies
name: Knockout Smoke

description:
A fire elemental magic attack that reduces magical
attack and defense of one enemy.
name: Burning Strike

message2: A thick, choking fog spreads out.
name: Stench

message1: drags her nails across the table!
name: Nail Claw
Breast Slam
note:
<target action>
  motion wait: user
  action common event
  wait for animation
  action effect
  death break
</target action>

<finish action>
  immortal: targets, false
  wait for new line
  clear battle log
  perform finish
  wait for movement
  wait for effect
</finish action>

may also silence them.

description:
'Awaken O' Violet Lightning Spirit!' The strongest
lightning spell that hits all enemies multiple times.
name: Voltaic Destroyer

description:
The strongest wind skill that sends several physical
slashes on all enemies while reducing DEF and M.DEF.
name: Emerald Storm

description: Charms an opponent with a 25% chance
name: Charm Magic

description: A powerful dark magic that hits all enemies.
name: Nightmare Flare

description:
Unleashes a sphere of darkness around one enemy that
hits twice. May also cause blindness.
name: Dark Sphere

description:
A powerful ice magic that hits all enemies. Lowers
enemy agility for a short time.
name: Blizzard Breaker

description:
A wind magic that hits a target twice and can reduce
agility.
name: Wind Blade

description:
A basic earth spell that launches stone spikes at
an enemy but also enemy attack buffs
name: Rock Blast

description: Absorbs the enemies magic power to make it your own.
name: Drain Magic

description: Absorbs the enemies HP to make it your own.
name: Drain Vitality

description: Causes instant death on all enemies
name: Death Dealer

description: A skill that expends all of your own HP.
name: Self-Sacrifice

description: A skill that applies weakening debuffs.
name: Debilitating Kiss
